data.actual_result: The current screen that you see when tapping logout will be frozen and you can barely interact with UI elements, bringing up task manager/swapping apps helps a bit but you need to restart it ultimately to log in again
data.expected_result: You get brought to the login page of Discord
data.short_description: Logging out causes screen to freeze instead of bringing you to the login page
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on build 1336 (earlier versions including 1286 don't seem to have the issue) and log out of your account
